org.limit.ratelimiter.configurations

Class RedisConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.limit.ratelimiter.configurations.RedisConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class RedisConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

    Redis Configuration Class

    This class is responsible for setting the redis configuration and connection to redis server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Munish

      org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory()
      Creates a JedisConnectionFactory with the specified redis configuration settings.

    • Constructor Detail

        public RedisConfiguration()

    • Method Detail

      • redisConnectionFactory

        @Bean
public org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory()
        Creates a JedisConnectionFactory with the specified redis configuration settings.

        The returned JedisConnectionFactory is used by RedisTemplate to connect to the redis server.

        Returns:
        JedisConnectionFactory

      • redisTemplate

        @Bean
public org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate<java.lang.String,TokenBucket> redisTemplate()
        Creates a RedisTemplate for redis data access.

        The returned JedisConnectionFactory is used by RedisTemplate to connect to the redis server.

        The returned RateLimiter is used for redis data access for model TokenBucket.

        Returns:
        RedisTemplate
